article: A young man works hard on his lessons. He is very busy studying. He doesn't have  _  to rest. After sometime, he falls ill. Every night, when he goes to bed, he  _  his eyes and tries to sleep. But he can't. He thinks, "I must go to  _  the doctor." He tells the doctor, "I can't go to sleep at night." "Try counting  _  . When you reach 1,000, you'll be asleep," says the doctor. The next day the man goes back to the doctor's office. "Well," says the doctor, "  _  are you today?" "Well," the man says, "I tried counting one, two, three ... up to 1,000.  _  when I reached 569, I began  _  feel sleepy . I had to  get up  and  _  some tea. Then I went on counting up to 1,000 again. But I  _  couldn't fall asleep."
